title: Ticket #2009: Update vmu documentation regarding disk & cdroms
remarks:
2011-Mar-31 15:07:06 by tstclair:
I am by no means a LaTeX expert so I have attached a patch against V7_6-branch for review and incorporation.

2011-Apr-06 15:56:19 by smoler:
Patch applied; corrections to patch's changes made; further changes put in with SHA1 a70bdd0b4f302725eabb579c768fddc069d96baf reverted, since they contained no difference in information presented, but did cause submit commands to be no longer in alphabetical order and changed a sentence to make it grammatically incorrect (again, with no difference in info).

So, ticket being resolved.
attachments:
• vmu_doc_changes.patch 12513 bytes added by tstclair on 2011-Mar-31 20:05:16 UTC.
    modifications to vmu documentation requires review
check_ins:
2011-Apr-06 11:44   Check-in [25993]: Revert "Ticket #2009: Update vmu documentation regarding disk & cdroms" Bad commit, as it places commands out of alphabetical order, and turns a valid sentence into a runon, with no information changed at all. This reverts commit a70bdd0b4f302725eabb579c768fddc069d96baf. (By Karen Miller )
2011-Apr-06 10:04   Check-in [25991]: Ticket #2009: Update vmu documentation regarding disk & cdroms (By Timothy St. Clair )
